Title: Google’s iOS app will use AI to simplify jargon
Description:
Google has a new AI tool that can help iPhone users to better grasp complicated or confusing writing online.
The Simplify feature, rolling out in the Google app on iOS starting today, generates a simpler, more digestible version of any highlighted text withou…

Title: First Price Drop Comes Early, Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 Now at Its Lowest Yet on Amazon
Description: Save 20% on the Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 wireless Bluetooth earbuds for a limited time.

Title: Visa applications for some nationalities could be restricted
Description: People from Pakistan, Nigeria and Sri Lanka may find it more difficult to come to the UK, under new plans.

Title: 'That's me': Man from VE Day photo recalls life in bombed city
Description: How Hull, the most heavily bombed city outside London, marked victory in 1945.

Title: Trump and Canadian PM to meet today. And, the best Met Gala looks
Description:
Trump and Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney are set to meet today as tensions between their two countries rise.
And, the best looks from last night's star-studded Met Gala.

Title: Most Americans use federal science information on a weekly basis, new poll finds
Description:
Most Americans frequently use federal science information.
But few are concerned that cuts to federal science spending could affect their access to such information, a new poll finds.

Title: Trump expands military use at the southern border. Are there legal limits?
Description:
The Posse Comitatus Act restricts using federal troops in civilian law enforcement.
Exceptions exist, but Trump's crackdown on immigration is shaping up to be a major test for the law.

Title: Hugo Administrators Resign in Wake of ChatGPT Controversy

Title: EY CEO says AI won't decrease its 400,000-person workforce — but it might help it double in size
Description: At the Milken conference, EY CEO Janet Truncale talked about how the consulting giant tests AI tools on its own workforce before recommending them.

Title: The rise of the college bed party: Parents are spending big bucks to announce their kid's college decision — and small business owners are cashing in
Description:
College bed parties have created a pathway to turn lucrative side-hustles into six-figure businesses.
BI spoke with consumers and business owners.

Title: A millennial couple shares how they navigated the IVF process — and the $18,000 medical bill
Description: Barrett and Shiraine McLeod told BI about their experience with IVF, how they covered the cost, and tips on navigating insurance.

Title: DoorDash buys Deliveroo for £2.9B — less than half its IPO price
Description:
US food delivery giant DoorDash has acquired British rival Deliveroo in a £2.9bn ($3.9bn) deal, ending the UK business’ rocky tenure as a public company.
The all-cash offer, priced at £1.80 ($2.40) per share, represents a 77% premium over Deliveroo’s recent …

Title: Beyond the humanoid hype: Why specialized robots will dominate the next decade
Description: Humanoid robots inspire awe, but purpose-built robots solving hard problems will rule in the near term.

Title: Federal judge says results of North Carolina court race must be certified
Description: A federal judge has ruled that disputed ballots in the still unresolved 2024 race for a North Carolina Supreme Court seat must remain in the final count

Title: Congressional Republicans Have Two Bad Options
Description: How to make sense of their stumbling progress—perhaps—toward a major fiscal bill

Title: The Death of Feminism
Description: Spice Girls slogans and reality-TV aesthetics: A new book traces how feminism morphed into clickable objectification.

Title: Hyper – Outperform React on every metric
Description:
Today I'm releasing Hyper: a simple markup language for building user interfaces.
It enables developers (and AI models) to generate complex UIs with amazingly clean syntax.
It aims to make frontend development enjoyable.
